todoList.title: Scan for doc placeholders
todoList.description: Scan the repository for TODO, FIXME, placeholder, and stub markers and generate a prioritized list of files to fix (focus on audit/release docs first). Create REPORTS/DOCS_CLEANUP_REPORT.md entry for high-priority items.

todoList.title: Apply high-priority doc fixes
todoList.description: Apply non-ambiguous fixes to high-priority docs (AUDITORIA-*, CHECKLIST*, RELEASE-GUIDE.md). Replace placeholders with concrete text or convert to tracked issues when ambiguous.

todoList.title: Create issues for ambiguous items
todoList.description: For placeholders that require decisions, create GitHub issues (or local TODO list) listing the required input and suggested owners.

todoList.title: Update templates
todoList.description: Sanitize and standardize templates under `docs/templates/` to use explicit tokens and guidance for maintainers.

todoList.title: Run tests and validate
todoList.description: Run test suite (Vitest/Playwright/cargo) to ensure no regressions after doc changes and any related code edits; fix any issues found.

todoList.title: Open PR with changes
todoList.description: Bundle edits into a branch, create a PR, and include `REPORTS/DOCS_CLEANUP_REPORT.md` with a summary and next steps.
